item.title: Installation
item.description:
HUGO v0.32 minimum required to use this theme

The following steps are here to help you initialize your new website. If you donâ€™t know Hugo at all, we strongly suggest you to train by following this great documentation for beginners.

item.title: Configuration
item.description: When building the website, you can set a theme by using --theme option. We suggest you to edit your configuration file and set the theme by default. Example with config.toml format.
